He tr___ to b_ strict wi__ her, and ma__ her st___ more, but i_ didn't he__. He finally had to ask her to show him her homework every night so he could check it.
data.fullContent: Kyle was disappointed in his daughter's performance. Usually she was a successful student, but lately her grades went dropping. He tried to be strict with her, and made her study more, but it didn't help. He finally had to ask her to show him her homework every night so he could check it.
data.answer: 凯尔对他女儿的表现感到失望。通常她是一个很成功的学生，但最近她的成绩下降了。他想对她严格些，让她多学点，但没有用。最后，他不得不让她每晚给他看作业，这样他就可以检查了。
